summary: Cluely is an undetectable AI-powered desktop assistant designed to provide real-time support by observing your screen and listening to audio during video calls, interviews, sales calls, and exams. It aims to help users 'cheat' seamlessly by offering discreet assistance without detection.

key_features: Invisible operation during video calls and screen sharing
Real-time assistance by seeing the user's screen and hearing audio
Supports interviews, sales calls, Zoom meetings, and exams
Undetectable AI that runs discreetly in-browser or on desktop
product.value_proposition: Cluely enables users to perform better in high-stakes situations by providing instant, covert help, effectively allowing them to 'never think alone again.'

team.additional_info: The team is focused on reimagining human-technology interaction through invisible AI assistants.

signals: Went viral with bold claims about its hidden in-browser window AI assistant
Community submitted reviews in 2025 indicating user engagement and feedback

market.potential_fit: Cluely operates in the emerging market of AI-driven personal assistants that enhance human performance in professional and academic settings.

technologies: Real-time data processing for live assistance
